description: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase
name: A Worthy Skull

description: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a Charge action in this phase
name: Blood for the Blood God!

description: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter begins a Move action adjacent to one of your fighters and ends it adjacent to none of your fighters
name: Coward!

description: Score this immediately if your warband takes two or more enemy fighters out of action in this phase
name: Draw the Gaze of Khorne

description: Score this in an end phase if at least one fighter from each warband is out of action
name: It Begins

description: Score this in an end phase if five or more fighters are out of action
name: Khorne Cares Not

description: Score this in the third end phase if all fighters except one of your fighters are out of action
name: Khorne's Champion

description: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a successful Attack action in this phase
name: Let the Blood Flow

description: Score this in an end phase if no fighter is holding an objective
name: There is Only Slaughter

description: Choose a friendly fighter. They suffer 1 damage. Roll two extra attack dice for their first Attack action in the next activation
name: Blood Offering

description: All Attack actions in the next activation have the Sword characteristic, even if they would normally have the Hammer characteristic
name: Blood Rain

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action. Remove all wound tokens from one friendly fighter
name: Boon of Khorne

description: Remove one objective that you hold from the battlefield
name: Desecrate

description: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent friendly fighter out of action. Their attacker suffers 1 damage
name: Final Blow

description: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a fighter out of action. A friendly fighter can make an Attack action
name: Fuelled by Slaughter

description: The first friendly fighter who suffers any amount of damage in the next activation only suffers one damage
name: Insensate

description: Roll one extra attack dice for your first Attack action in the next activation
name: Khorne Calls

description: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes your last surviving fighter out of action. Roll a defense dice. If you roll a Shield or Crit remove all wound tokens from them, and place them on a starting hex in your territory
name: Rebirth in Blood

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action. Draw up to two power cards
name: Skulls for the Skull Throne!

description: Both Sword and Hammer symbols are successes when this fighter makes a Charge action
name: Berserk Charge

description: +1 Defence
name: Bloodslick

description: [1 Hex | 3 Sword | 1 Damage] Targets adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each
name: Deadly Spin

description: Reaction: When this fighter could be driven back during an Attack action (whether or not your opponent chooses to do so), you can instead push them one hex
name: Ever-Advancing

description: Roll an extra attack dice when this fighter makes a Charge action
name: Frenzy

description: When this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 additional glory point
name: Grisly Trophy

description: Action: Push each adjacent enemy fighter one hex
name: Terrifying Howl

description: When this fighter makes a Charge action they can move through other fighters, but their move must end in an empty hex
name: Unstoppable Charge

description: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2
name: Whirlwind of Death

description: [1 Hex | 3 Sword | 2 Damage] If you roll at least one Crit this Attack action has Cleave
name: Wicked Blade

description: Score this immediately if your warband has taken two or more fighters out of action in this phase
name: Awe-Inspiring

description: Score this in an end phase if you hold all objectives in enemy territory
name: Cleanse

description: Score this in an end phase if  there are no enemy fighters adjacent to your fighters
name: Consecrated Area

description: Score this in the third end phase if none of your fighters are out of action
name: Eternals

description: Score this in an end phase if  the same friendly fighter has held the same objective at the end of two consecutive action phases
name: Immovable Object

description: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a Charge action made by one of your fighters
name: Lightning Strikes

description: Score this in an end phase if  you hold an objective in enemy territory
name: Seize Ground

description: Score this in an end phase if none of your fighters suffered any damage in the preceding action phase
name: Sigmar's Bulwark

description: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase
name: Slayers of Tyrants

description: Choose a friendly fighter and put them on Guard
name: Heroic Guard

description: Choose any enemy fighter and push them one hex in any direction
name: Peal of Thunder

description: +1 Damage to the first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation
name: Righteous Zeal

description: Choose two adjacent friendly fighters and put them on Guard
name: Sigmarite Wall

description: Friendly fighters cannot be driven back by the first Attack action in the next activation
name: Stormforged Resistance

description: In the next activation make the following Reaction. Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Attack action that fails, choose up to two friendly fighters and push them up to one hex each
name: Stormforged Tactics

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that fails. That fighter can make another Attack action that targets the same fighter
name: Tireless Assault

description: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a friendly fighter out of action leaving one surviving friendly fighter on the battlefield. Remove all wound tokens from the surviving fighter
name: Undaunted

description: The first Attack action in the next activation gains Cleave
name: Unstoppable Strike

description: Enemy fighters cannot support the target of the first Attack action in the next activation
name: Valiant Attack

description: +1 Wounds
name: Blessed by Sigmar

description: Action: This fighter and all adjacent friendly fighters go on Guard
name: Block

description: [1 Hex | 2 Hammer | 2 Damage] Roll an extra attack dice if there are no adjacent friendly fighters
name: Brave Strike

description: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, roll an attack dice. On a roll of Hammer or Crit this fighter cannot be driven back and they can make an Attack action. It must target the attacker.
name: Fatal Riposte

description: This fighter's Attack action gains Cleave
name: Heroic Might

description: Reaction: After an enemy fighter ends their activation within two hexes of this fighter, you can push this fighter one hex
name: Heroic Stride

description: [2 Hex | 2 Hammer | 1 Damage] On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage
name: Lightning Blade

description: When they make a critical hit, this fighter also inflicts 1 damage on enemy fighters adjacent to the target's hex
name: Lightning Blast

description: [1 Hex | 3 Hammer | 2 Damage] Reaction: After this Attack action, if it failed and the target was an enemy leader, make this Attack action again
name: Righteous Strike

description: Reaction: During an adjacent fighter's Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, this fighter cannot be driven back and you can push their attacker one hex
name: Shield Bash

description: Score this in an end phase if two or more friendly fighters returned to the battlefield in the preceding action phase
name: Battle Without End

description: Score this in an end phase if  you hold every objective
name: Claim the City

description: Score this in an end phase if there is only one friendly fighter on the battlefield
name: Fearless in Death

description: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least five) made a Move action in the preceding action phase
name: March of the Dead

description: Score this in an end phase if your warband took two or more enemy fighters out of action in the preceding action phase
name: More Able Bodies

description: Score this in the third end phase if you have four or more surviving fighters, and none are Inspired
name: Peerless General

description: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy fighter out of action
name: Skills Unforgotten

description: Score this in the third end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least three) are Inspired
name: The Invigorated Dead

description: Score this in an end phase if each enemy fighter is adjacent to at least two friendly fighters
name: Undead Swarm

description: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that takes a friendly fighter out of action. The fighter that took them out of action suffers 1 damage
name: Bone Shrapnel

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action. Make an Attack action with another friendly fighter
name: Ceaseless Attacks

description: Each friendly fighter that is not on the battlefield is considered to be supporting the first Attack action in the next activation
name: Clawing Hands

description: Any friendly fighters that make a Move action in the next activation can move one additional hex
name: Danse Macabre

description: Reduce the Move characteristic of the first fighter to be activated in the next activation by the number of friendly fighters that are not on the battlefield, to a minimum of 0
name: Grasping Hands

description: Place a friendly fighter that was taken out of action (other than the Sepulchral Warden) on a starting hex in your territory
name: Restless Dead

description: Any friendly fighters that make a Move action in the next activation can move through additional fighters, but must end their moves on empty hexes
name: Spectral Form

description: Choose one friendly fighter and push them up to two hexes. Their new position must be further away from all enemy fighters
name: Swift Evasion

description: Choose an enemy fighter and push them one hex
name: Terrifying Screams

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that fails. Make the Attack action again
name: The Necromancer Commands

description: Action: Choose three other friendly fighters. Make Move actions with these fighters. This does not allow a fighter to move twice in a phase
name: Ancient Commander

description: Each friendly fighter that supports this fighter is considered to be two supporting fighters
name: Assumed Command

description: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +1 Damage in a phase in which they make a Charge action
name: Deathly Charge

description: [1 Hex | 2 Hammer | 2 Damage] Reaction: Make this Attack action during an Attack action that takes this fighter out of action, before they are removed from the battlefield. It must target their attacker
name: Fatal Strike

description: [1 Hex | 2 Hammer | 2 Damage] If you roll at least one Crit this Attack action has Cleave
name: Focused Attack

description: +2 Move
name: Frightening Speed
restricted: The Harvester, The Champion, The Prince of Dust

description: This fighter's Attack actions gain Cleave
name: Grim Cleave

description: [2 Hex | 2 Hammer | 3 Damage] Cleave
name: Lethal Lunge

description: This fighter's Defence characteristic changes to Shield
name: Remembered Shield
restricted: The Sepulchral Warden, The Prince of Dust, Petitioners

description: +1 Wounds
name: Undying

description: Score this in the third end phase if none of your fighters are out of action
name: 'Ard as Iron

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader took an enemy fighter out of action in the preceding action phase
name: Biggest an' da Best

description: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a Charge action this phase
name: Call of the Waaagh!

description: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter has two more supporting fighters than their target when making an Attack action
name: Dead Kunnin'

description: Score this in an end phase if you have more fighters on the battlefield than your opponent
name: Dere's More of Us

description: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase
name: Get Da Boss

description: Score this in an end phase if three or more fighters were taken out of action in the preceding action phase
name: Good Scrap

description: Score this in an end phase if each of your surviving fighters (at least two) made an Attack action against a different enemy fighter in the preceding action phase
name: Punch-Up

description: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter suffers 3 or more damage in a single attack and is not take out of action
name: Too Dumb to Die

description: Choose a fighter and roll an attack dice. If you roll a Hammer or Crit the can make an Attack action
name: 'Avin' a Good Time

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action. You can push that fighter up to three hexes
name: Brutal But Kunnin'

description: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to one of your fighters. Push that fighter one hex
name: Deafening Bellow

description: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage
name: Gorkamorka's Blessing

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Move action. That fighter can make an Attack action. You cannot play this during a Charge action
name: Kunnin' But Brutal

description: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action or ploy that will take a friendly fighter out of action, before removing them from the battlefield. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of Hammer or Crit make an Attack action with that fighter. It must target the attacker
name: Last Lunge

description: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action made by your leader that takes an enemy fighter out of action. Another friendly fighter that has not already made a Move or Charge action can make a Charge action
name: Leadin' By Example

description: Roll an extra attack dice for the first Attack action in the next activation
name: More Choppin'

description: Remove one objective that you hold from the battlefield
name: Pillage

description: Each friendly fighter that supports the first Attack action in the next activation is considered to be two supporting fighters
name: Scrag 'Em

description: When this fighter suffers damage, reduce that damage by 1 to a minimum of 1

description: Reaction: During an Attack action by this fighter that targets an enemy leader and fails, you can re-roll one attack dice

description: Roll an extra attack dice when this fighter makes a Charge action
name: Brutal Frenzy

description: [1 Hex | 3 Sword | 2 Damage] Targets all adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each
name: Brutal Swing

description: This fighter's Attack actions gain Cleave

description: This fighter can only be driven back by a critical hit
name: Dead 'Ard

description: [1 Hex | 2 Hammer | 2 Damage] If this Attack action succeeds, the target cannot be activated for the rest of the phase
name: 'Eadbutt

description: This fighter's Attack actions gain Knockback 1 in a phase in which they make a Charge action
name: Headlong Rush

description: Reaction: During an Attack action or ploy that takes this fighter out of action, roll a defence dice. If you roll a Shield or Crit they suffer no damage and are not taken out of action, and you discard this upgrade

description: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +1 Damage in a phase in which they make a Charge action

description: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase

description: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least three) made a Charge action in the preceding action phase

description: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy fighter out of action

description: The first time a friendly fighter suffers damage in the next activation, roll a defence dice. If the result is a Shield they suffer no damage

description: The first time a friendly fighter suffers damage in the next activation, they only suffer 1 damage

description: Choose two friendly fighters and push each of them up to one hex. They must end up adjacent to one another

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that fails. That fighter can make another Attack action that targets the same fighter

description: Choose an enemy fighter. They cannot make an Attack action or a Charge action in the next activation

description: If the first Attack action in the next activation is a critical hit, double its Damage characteristic

description: Choose a fighter and push them one hex
name: The Earth Shakes

description: Choose a friendly fighter and push them up to three hexes. They must end up holding an objective

description: Choose a friendly fighter and roll a defence dice. On a roll of Shield or Crit remove up to two wound tokens from them. Otherwise remove one wound token from them

description: Friendly fighters holding objectives cannot be driven back by the first Attack action in the next activation
name: We Shall Not Be Moved

description: Each time this fighter make an Attack action, you can re-roll one dice
name: Activated Runes

description: This fighter's Attack actions gain Knockback 1
name: Brute Strength

description: [1 Hex | 3 Sword | 1 Damage] Reaction: During an Attack action that succeeds against this fighter, this fighter cannot be driven back and makes this Attack action. It must target the attacker
name: Defiant Strike

description: [1 Hex | 3 Sword | 2 Damage]
name: Flurry of Blows

description: [1 Hex | 2 Sword | 2 Damage] Targets all adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each
name: Great Swing

description: Reaction: During an Attack action or ploy that would take this fighter out of action, roll a defence dice. If you roll a Shield the damage suffered by this fighter is ignored

description: +1 Defence

description: +2 Move

name: Returning Axe

description: This fighter is considered to be two supporting fighters when they support, rather than one

description: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter out of action while they are adjacent to none of your fighters

description: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage

description: Roll an extra defence dice for the first friendly fighter to be targeted by an Attack action in the next activation

description: Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to two or more friendly fighters. That fighter makes a Charge action

description: Choose a friendly fighter and put them on Guard

description: Choose a friendly fighter. They switch places with any adjacent fighter

description: Double the Move characteristic of the first friendly fighter to make a Move action in the next activation. They may not make a Charge action. Once they have moved, they cannot be activated again this phase

description: Choose one friendly fighter that is out of action (other than Skritch or Krrk). Remove all wound tokens from them and place them on any starting hex
name: There Are Always More

description: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 have +1 Damage, and target all adjacent fighters (friend and foe) - roll for each. Fighters do not provide support for Attack actions against friendly models (in attack or defence)

description: If Skritch is adjacent to this fighter, Skritch is on Guard (even if Skritch has made a Charge action this phase)

description: Reaction: During an Attack action that will cause any damage to this fighter, you can remove them from the battlefield and deal 1 damage to their attacker

description: Score this in the third end phase if all surviving enemy fighters are in their territory
name: Contained

description: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes a Move action of six or more hexes
name: Cover Ground

description: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes a successful attack that deals at least twice as much damage as is needed to take their target out of action
name: Crushing Force

description: Score this in an end phase if your fighters are outnumbered by at least three to one
name: Dauntless

description: Score this immediately when your warband takes an enemy fighter standing in your territory out of action
name: Defensive Strike

description: Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory
name: Denial

description: Score this in an end phase if the same friendly fighter has held the same objective at the end of two consecutive action phases
name: Determined Defender

description: Score this is an end phase if each player has at least one fighter in their own territory and at least one fighter in enemy territory
name: Divide and Conquer

description: Score this in the third end phase if five or more enemy fighters are out of action
name: Endless Slaughter

description: Score this in an end phase if three or more upgrade cards were played in the preceding action phase
name: Escalation

description: Score this in an end phase if there are at least three enemy fighters adjacent to the same friendly fighter
name: Fearless

description: Score this in an end phase if you scored two or more other objective cards in this phase
name: Flawless Strategy

description: Score this in an end phase if each of your surviving figthers (at least three) has at least one upgrade
name: Geared for War

description: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least three) are Inspired
name: Heroes All

description: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's Attack action succeeds when their target has two or more supporting fighters more then the attacker
name: Heroic Feat

description: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 1
name: Hold Objective 1

description: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 2
name: Hold Objective 2

description: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 3
name: Hold Objective 3

description: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 4
name: Hold Objective 4

description: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 5
name: Hold Objective 5

description: Score this in an end phase if you played no ploy cards during the preceding action phase
name: Honest Opponent

description: Score this in an end phase if at least one fighter was taken out of action in the preceding action phase in enemy territory, in your territory and in no one's territory
name: Killing Ground

description: Score this in an end phase if you hold all objectives (at least one) in your opponent's territory
name: Making a Statement

description: Score this immediately if your fighters deal 7 or more damage in an action phase (damage in excess of a fighter's Wounds characteristic is included)
name: Massive Assault

description: Score this in an end phase if you scored an objective card, played a ploy card and played an upgrade card in this round
name: Master of War

description: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action by an Attack action made as a Reaction by your warband or a Reaction made by your warband that causes damage
name: Masterstroke

description: Score this immediately if one of your fighters is the target of an enemy Attack action with a Dice characteristic of 3 or more that fails
name: Miraculous Escape

description: Score this in an end phase if your warband dealt damage to three or more enemy fighters in the preceding action phase
name: Multiple Fronts

description: Score this in an end phase if you have no power cards in your hand
name: No More Tricks

description: Score this immediately if one of your fighters takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action with a Damage characteristic greater than the target's Wounds characteristic
name: No Remorse

description: Score this in an end phase if you hold three or more objectives
name: Our Only Way Out

description: Score this in an end phase if you hold every objective
name: Overextended

description: Score this in an end phase if none of your fighters made a Move action in the preceding action phase
name: Perfect Planning

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader is holding an objective in enemy territory
name: Plant a Standard

description: Score this in an end phase if you played three or more ploys in the preceding action phase
name: Ploymaster

description: Score this in an end phase if at least three friendly fighters are adjacent to the same enemy fighter
name: Poised to Strike

description: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes a successful Attack action that deals exactly enough damage to take their target out of action
name: Precise Use of Force

description: Score this in the third end phase if seven or more fighters are out of action
name: Pure Carnage

description: Score this in an end phase if all remaining enemy fighters (at least three) have an upgrade
name: Ready for a Challenge

description: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's attack takes two or more enemy fighters out of action
name: Reaper

description: Score this in an end phase if all surviving enemy fighters (at least three) have at least one wound token
name: Scent of Victory

description: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least two) are on edge hexes
name: Skirting Danger

description: Score this in an end phase if your opponent played no power cards in the preceding action phase
name: Stymied

description: Score this in the third end phase if you have scored six or more other objective cards
name: Superior Tactician

description: Score this in an end phase if you hold three or more objectives
name: Supremacy

description: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters are in enemy territory
name: Swift Advance

description: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 1, 2 and 3
name: Tactical Genius 1-3

description: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 3, 4 and 5
name: Tactical Genius 3-5

description: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 1 and 2
name: Tactical Supremacy 1-2

description: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 3 and 4
name: Tactical Supremacy 3-4

description: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action that had a Damage characteristic of 1
name: The Bigger They Are

description: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes an Attack action that damages three or more enemy fighters
name: The Harvest Begins

description: Score this in the first or second end phase if all enemy fighters have been taken out of action
name: Total Annihilation

description: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter takes damage from a friendly fighter's Attack action because they cannot be driven back
name: Trapped

description: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least three) are neither in your territory nor enemy territory
name: Twilight Conqueror

description: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) are in a single group with each friendly fighter adjacent to another friendly fighter
name: Unbroken Wall

description: Score this immediately if one of your fighters makes a successful Attack action against an enemy fighter on Guard
name: Unstoppable

description: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy leader out of action
name: Victorious Duel

description: Score this in an end phase if you scored three or more other objective cards in this round
name: Victory After Victory

description: Score this in an end phase if the same number of fighters (at least one) from each warband are out of action
name: War of Attrition

description: Play this card after the final activation in an action phase. Name an objective card. If an opponent scores that objective in the end phase, score a glory point
name: Anticipation

description: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action with a Range of 3 or greater (before any dice are rolled). The Attacks characteristic of that Attack action is changed to Sword 1
name: Blinding Flash

description: Switch two objectives that are currently being held
name: Confused Priorities

description: Choose two fighters that are adjacent to each other and switch them
name: Confusion

description: Choose an enemy fighter and roll an attack dice. On a roll of Hammer or Crit they are no longer Inspired, and cannot be Inspired this game
name: Cruel Taunt

description: For the first Attack action in the next activation, Hammer characteristics become Sword characteristics and vice versa, and Dodge characteristics become Shield characteristics and vice versa
name: Curious Inversion

description: The first Attack action in the next activation has a Range of 1
name: Darkness Descends

description: Roll an attack dice. If you roll a Hammer or Crit take one of your opponent's unspent glory points
name: Daylight Robbery

description: Reaction: Play this card during an Attack action or ploy that will take a friendly fighter out of action. Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to the taret. They suffer 1 damage
name: Death Throes

description: When resolving the first Attack action in the next activation, you and your opponent roll off. The winner chooses whether the Attack action fails or succeeds
name: Desperate Gambit

description: Choose an enemy fighter and push them one hex
name: Distraction

description: One fighter supporting the first Attack action in the next activation is considered to be two supporting fighters
name: Dual Strike

description: Reaction: Play this when an opponent plays a ploy. Draw two power cards
name: Duel of Wits

description: Push all fighters one hex. You must push them all in the same direction. Any that cannot be pushed this way are not pushed
name: Earthquake

description: The first friendly fighter to be targeted by an Attack action in the next activation has +1 Defence
name: Ephemeral Shield

description: Roll eight dice. Choose a friendly fighter and push them up to a number of hexes equal to the number of Crit rolled
name: Flickering Step

description: Reaction: Play this when an opponent plays a ploy. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of Shield or Crit that ploy has no effect
name: Forceful Denial

description: Friendly fighters holding objectives have +1 Defence for the next activation
name: Fortify

description: Choose an enemy fighter and roll a defence dice. On a roll of Shield or Crit that fighter cannot make any actions or be damaged in this phase
name: Frozen in Time

description: You can re-roll any attack dice for the first friendly fighter's Attack action in the next activation
name: Fuelled by Fury

description: Reaction: Play this after an adjacent enemy fighter makes an Attack action that drives a friendly fighter back. Push the attacker into the hex the friendly fighter was driven back from
name: Grapple

description: Choose a hex on the battlefield, then push all fighters one hex (in whichever order you choose). This push must move them away from the chosen hex. If there is no hex you could push a figther into, do not push them
name: Great Concussion

description: Choose a friendly fighter and roll a defence dice. On a roll of Shield or Crit remove up to two wound tokens from them. Otherwise remove one wound token from them
name: Healing Potion

description: Choose a friendly figther that hasn't made a Move action this phase and is on any edge hex. Place them on any other edge hex. They are considered to have made a Move action
name: Hidden Paths

description: Choose one of your fighters on the battlefield. Place them on a starting hex in your territory
name: Illusory Fighter

description: Discard all power cards in your hand and draw three power cards
name: Improvisation

description: Choose a friendly fighter. They become Inspired
name: Inspiration Strikes

description: All fighters' Move characteristics are reduced to 1 for the next activation
name: Invisible Walls

description: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action that would take a friendly fighter out of action. Roll a defence dice. If the result would not normally be a success for this fighter, ignore the damage from that Attack action on this fighter
name: Last Chance

description: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a friendly fighter out of action. Choose one of their universal upgrades and give it to an adjacent friendly fighter
name: Legacy

description: If the first Attack action in the next activation is a critical hit, double its Damage characteristic for that Attack action
name: Lethal Strike

description: Your first Attack action with a Range characteristic of 1 in the next activation targets all adjacent enemy fighters. Roll for each
name: Mighty Swing

description: Taking it in turns with your opponent(s), starting with you and going clockwise, move each objective one hex. Objectives cannot be moved into a hex that already contains an objective
name: Mischievous Spirits

description: Reaction: Play this when a friendly fighter is chosen by a ploy. Choose another friendly fighter that could be chosen by that ploy. That fighter is chosen instead
name: Misdirection

description: Choose an enemy fighter and roll an attack dice. If you roll a Hammer or Crit make an Attack action with them as if they were a friendly fighter. Fighters do not provide support for this Attack action (in attack or defence)
name: Momentary Madness

description: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that damages a friendly fighter. Push them up to one hex and make an Attack action with them
name: My Turn

description: No more power cards can be played until after the next activation
name: No Time

description: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action or ploy that would take a friendly fighter out of action, when there is a friendly fighter adjacent to them. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of Shield or Crit the fighter does not suffer damage and is not taken out of action
name: On Your Feet

description: The first time one of your fighters is targeted in the next activation, roll an extra defence dice. When counting your successes, ignore one of the defence dice
name: Parry

description: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Move action. Make a Move action with a friendly fighter who has not already made a Move action in this phase
name: Quick Thinker

description: Reaction: Play this after you upgrade a fighter in an action phase. They can make a Move or Attack action
name: Ready for Action

description: Reaction: Play this during an enemy Attack action that would succeed. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of Dodge or Crit the attacker suffers the damage, rather than the target, and neither fighter is driven back
name: Rebound

description: Choose a friendly fighter with at least one wound token, and an adjacent enemy fighter. The enemy fighter suffers 1 damage
name: Reflected Injury

description: Discard any number of objective cards and draw that number of objective cards
name: Rethink Strategy

description: Choose a friendly fighter. If they are taken out of action in the next activation, you gain a glory point
name: Sacrificial Pawn

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent enemy fighter with an upgrade out of action. Gain an additional glory point
name: Scavenge

description: Choose a friendly fighter that made a Charge action this phase. In the next activation, they can be activated as if they had Moved rather than Charged
name: Second Wind

description: Place a Shardfall token in an unoccupied hex. That hex is blocked until the end of the phase
name: Shardfall

description: All fighters suffer 1 damage
name: Shardgale

description: Any fighters that make a Move action, are pushed or are driven back in the next activation suffer 1 damage
name: Shattering Terrain

description: Choose an enemy fighter, and choose one of their upgrades. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of Hammer or Crit that upgrade is discarded
name: Shattershard

description: Move an unheld objective one hex. You cannot move it into a hex that already contains an objective
name: Shifting Shards

description: Choose a friendly fighter and push them one hex
name: Sidestep

description: The first fighter to make a Move action in the next activation has +2 Move
name: Spectral Wings

description: Play an upgrade card. This doesn't cost a glory point
name: Spoils of Battle

description: Double the move characteristic of the first friendly fighter to make a Move action in the next activation. They may not make a Charge action. Once they have moved, they cannot be activated again in this phase
name: Sprint

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action drives an enemy fighter back. They are driven back an additional hex in the same direction
name: Stumble

description: Remove one wound token from each fighter who has at least one wound token
name: Tainted Vitality

description: The first friendly fighter to take a Move action in the next activation can move up to an additional two hexes if they end their move on an objective
name: Tantalising Prize

description: Reaction: Play this card during a friendly fghter's Attack action, before rolling any dice. Push another friendly fighter one hex
name: Teamwork

description: Choose a fighter. They can take an action. Skip your next activation (you cannot play this card after your fourth activation)
name: Time Trap

description: Reaction: Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action that drives an enemy fighter back. The enemy fighter suffers 1 damage
name: Trap

description: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action. You can push each enemy fighter adjacent to the friendly fighter one hex
name: Triumphant Roar

description: Discard any number of power cards and draw up to that number of power cards from your deck
name: Trust to Luck

description: Reaction: Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action that has a Range of 1 and will succeed. It has +1 Damage for that Attack action
name: Twist the Knife

description: If this figther is not out of action at the end of the third action phase, gain 1 additional glory point
name: A Destiny to Meet

description: If this fighter has a Dodge characteristic or has a Shield Defence characteristic but is on Guard, roll an extra defence dice when they are the target of an Attack action
name: Acrobatic

description: If this fighter is the last friendly fighter on the battlefield, they have +1 Defence and all of their Attack actions have +1 Dice
name: Army of One

description: You can re-roll one attack dice each time this fighter makes an Attack action
name: Awakened Weapon

description: When you roll a Crit for this fighter when they are targetted by an Attack action, remove one wound token from them before any damage is dealt
name: Blessed Armour

description: On a critical hit, this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 have +2 Damage
name: Concealed Weapon

description: [1 Hex | 2 Sword | 2 Damage] When making this Attack action, roll an extra attack dice for each other friendly figther adjacent to the target
name: Coordinated Attack

description: Reaction: During this fighter's Attack action that succeeds against an adjacent enemy fighter, instead of driving the target back you can switch the two fighters' places
name: Cunning Duellist

description: +1 Defense, -1 Wounds
name: Cursed Artefact

description: [1 Hex | 2 Hammer | 3 Damage] Each time this fighter makes this Attack action, they first suffer 1 damage
name: Daemonic Weapon

description: [3 Hex | 3 Sword | 1 Damage] Cleave
name: Dark Darts

description: -2 Move, +2 Wounds
name: Deathly Fortitude

description: [1 Hex | 2 Hammer | 1 Damage] Reaction: After this Attack action, if it is successful, you can push this fighter one hex
name: Disengage

description: This fighter's Defence characteristic changes to Shield
name: Ethereal Shield

description: Reaction: After an Attack action made by this fighter that scores a critical hit, you can push them up to two hexes
name: Flickering Image

description: [1 Hex | 3 Hammer | 1 Damage] When rolling defence dice, only rolls of Crit are successes for the target of this Attack action. This Attack action can never cause more than 1 damage to a target
name: Ghostblade

description: +1 Wounds
name: Great Fortitude

description: +1 Move
name: Great Speed

description: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2
name: Great Strength

description: When this fighter makes a Charge action, increase their Move characteristic by 1 until the end of the activation
name: Headlong Charge

description: If this fighter has no adjacent friendly fighters, rolls of Single Support are a success when they make an Attack action
name: Helpful Whispers

description: [1 Hex | 1 Hammer | 4 Damage]
name: Heroslayer

description: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2
name: Incredible Strength

description: If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities.
name: Katophrane's Belt

description: If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities.
name: Katophrane's Boots

description: If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities.
name: Katophrane's Gloves

description: If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities.
name: Katophrane's Hood

description: If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities.
name: Katophrane's Locket

description: If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities.
name: Katophrane's Plate

description: +1 Move
name: Legendary Swiftness

description: Rolls of Crit on a defence dice are no longer a success for this fighter. Roll an extra attack dice when this fighter make an Attack action
name: Light Armour

description: Reaction: During an Attack action that could drive this fighter back (whether or not your opponent chose to), you can instead push them one hex
name: Light-footed

description: [1 Hex | 2 Hammer | 1 Damage] Both Sword and Hammer symbols are successes for this Attack action
name: Low Blow

description: Reaction: After a failed Attack action that targets this fighter, you can push them one hex
name: Opportunist

description: At the beginning of each action phase, remove up to one wound token from this fighter
name: Regeneration

description: If your warband's leader is out of action, this fighter is considered to be a leader. While this fighter is on the battlefield, opponents cannot score objectives for having taken your leader out of action
name: Second-in-command

description:
[1 Hex | 2 Hammer | 2 Damage] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage
[3 Hex | 2 Hammer | 2 Damage] After a fighter makes this Attack action, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage
name: Shadeglass Axe

description: [1 Hex | 3 Sword | 3 Damage] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage
name: Shadeglass Dagger

description: [3 Hex | 3 Sword | 1 Damage] On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage
name: Shadeglass Darts

description: [1 Hex | 2 Hammer | 3 Damage] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage
name: Shadeglass Hammer

description: [2 Hex | 2 Hammer | 2 Damage] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage
name: Shadeglass Spear

description: [1 Hex | 3 Hammer | 2 Damage] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage
name: Shadeglass Sword

description: This fighter can move through other fighters during a Move action, but must end their move in an empty hex
name: Shadestep

description: At the beginning of each action phase, you can switch an objective held by this fighter with any other objective
name: Shardcaller

description: Reaction: After any Attack action in which you roll a Crit for this fighter (with an attack or defence dice), you can push this fighter one hex
name: Shifting Image

description: Your opponent can never consider a Double Support as a success for Attack actions that target this fighter
name: Sixth Sense

description: This fighter can only be driven back by a critical hit
name: Solid Stance

description: Reaction: During an Attack action or ploy that takes this fighter out of action, roll a defence dice. If you roll a Shield or Crit they suffer no damage and are not taken out of action, and you discard this upgrade
name: Soultrap

description: +1 Move
name: Sprinter

description: Reaction: During an Attack action that could drive this fighter back (whether or not your opponent chose to), you can instead push them one hex
name: Superior Agility

description: [1 Hex | 3 Sword | 1 Damage] Reaction: Before making this Attack action, push this fighter one hex
name: Swift Strike

description: Reaction: During an Attack action or ploy that takes this fighter out of action, roll a defence dice. If you roll a Shield or Crit place them on any starting hex in your territory, ignore the damage and discard this upgrade. If you cannot, they are taken out of action
name: Tethered Spirit

description: If this fighter is holding objective 3 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points
name: The Blazing Key

description: If this fighter is holding objective 4 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points
name: The Dazzling Key

description: If this fighter is holding an objective in the third end phase, score 1 glory point
name: The Formless Key

description: If this fighter is holding objective 5 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points
name: The Fractured Key

description: If this fighter is holding objective 1 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points
name: The Hallowed Key

description: If this fighter is holding objective 2 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points
name: The Shadowed Key

description: You can roll two additional attack dice when this fighter takes an Attack action, though not when this fighter takes a Charge action. If you do so, this fighter cannot be activated again this phase
name: Total Offence

description: If this fighter is on the battlefield, you can play a single ploy card at the beginning of each action phase
name: Trickster's Charm

description: You can re-roll one defence dice for this fighter when they are the target of an Attack action
name: Trusted Defender

description: [1 Hex | 1 Hammer | 2 Damage] Rolls of Hammer are considered to be rolls of Crit for this Attack action
name: Unparalleled Strike

description: When this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action, remove one wound token from this figther
name: Vampiric Weapon

description: When this fighter makes a Charge action, their Attack actions gain Knockback 1 for that activation
name: War Cry

description: This fighter is considered to have an additional supporting fighter while they are holding an objective
name: Zealous Defender

description: Your leader has +1 Defence for the first Attack action in the next activation
name: Invulnerable

description: This fighter’s Attack actions have +1 Damage when they are adjacent to a friendly leader
name: Steelheart's Second

description: Score this in an end phase if the only surviving fighters (at least 2) are leaders
name: The Stage Is Set

description: Reaction: Play this when your leader takes an enemy leader out of action. Gain a glory point
name: Coveted Trophy

description: Score this in an end phase if three friendly Petitioners are surviving and Inspired
name: Fervent Petition

description: Action: Choose two friendly fighters (other than your leader) and put them on Guard
name: Warden's Call

description: Score this in an end phase is your leader took two or more enemy fighters out of action in the preceding action phase
name: Showin' Off

description: +1 Damage for the first Attack action in the next activation made by a friendly fighter adjacent to your leader
name: Impress da Boss

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader has three or more upgrades with his warband symbol
name: Pride of the Lodge

description: The first friendly fighter (other than your leader) to make a Move action (not as part of a Charge action) in the next activation has +2 Move. You can only play this if your leader is on the battlefield
name: Grimnir Commands

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader is out of action and a friendly fighter named Krrk is on the battlefield
name: Krrk Now Leads!

description: Action: Return a friendly fighter (other than Skritch) to the battlefield in an empty hex adjacent to this fighter
name: Krrk the Clawchief

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader is the only surviving fighter
name: Khorne's Chosen

description: Attack actions that target this fighter deal 1 less damage, to a minimum of 1
name: Gory Visage

description: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy holding an objective out of action
name: Intervention

description: Choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of your leader. They take 1 damage
name: Raptor Strike

description: Score this in the first end phase if your leader is in enemy territory
name: Bold Advance

description: Score this immediately if your leader is chosen by three or more ploys in this phase
name: Drawing Focus

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader is the only friendly fighter adjacent to any enemy fighters
name: Fearless Leader

description: Score this immediately if your leader takes three or more enemy fighters out of action in this phase
name: Great Slayer

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader is on the battlefield and was the target of three or more Attack actions in the preceding action phase
name: Impervious

description: Score this immediately if your leader was a supporting fighter during three or more Attack actions in this phase
name: Linchpin

description: Score this in the first end phase if an enemy leaders is out of action
name: Neutralise

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader is on the battlefield and Inspired
name: Shining Example

description: Score this immediately if your leader takes two or more enemy fighters out of action in this phase
name: Slayer

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader is the only friendly fighter on the battlefield
name: Sufficient

description: Score this in an end phase if you activated your leader with four activations in the preceding action phase
name: Tireless Commander

description: Score this in the third end phase if your leader is on the battlefield
name: Undefeated

description: Score this in an end phase if your leader is adjacent to two or more friendly fighters
name: Well-guarded

description: Choose an enemy leader. Their Move characteristic (before other modifiers) is 1 for the next activation
name: Burden of Command

description: Put your leader on Guard
name: Cautious Commander

description: Your leader’s first Attack action with a Range of 1 that only targets a single fighter in the next activation has a Range of 2
name: Commanding Reach

description: You can re-roll one attack dice during your leader’s first Attack action in the next activation
name: Commanding Strike

description: Choose an enemy leader. The Dice characteristic (before other modifiers) of their first Attack action in the next activation is 1
name: Crippling Doubt

description: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action that will take your leader out of action, before they are removed from the battlefield. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of Hammer or Crit, make an Attack action with them before they are removed from the battlefield
name: Final Duty

description: Reaction: Play this after you play a power card in the power step. You can immediately play another power card. You can only play this if your leader is on the battlefield
name: Great Cunning

description: Remove one wound token from your leader’s fighter card
name: Hidden Reserves

description: Choose a friendly fighter (other than your leader) and push them up to one hex or put them on Guard. You can only play this if your leader is on the battlefield
name: Inspired Command

description: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action that will damage your leader. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of Single Support, Double Support, or Crit, choose a friendly fighter adjacent to them. That fighter suffers the damage instead, then 1 additional damage, and no fighters are driven back
name: Look Out!

description: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action that targets your leader, after the dice are rolled. Your leader cannot be driven back by the Attack action
name: No Retreat

description: In the next activation, you can re-roll one or more defence dice when your leader is the target of an Attack action
name: Premonition

description: Choose up to two friendly fighters (other than your leader) and push each of them up to one hex. You can only play this if your leader is on the battlefield
name: Quick Advance

description: Choose your leader and an adjacent friendly fighter. Switch their positions
name: Quick Manoeuvre

description: Choose a friendly fighter (other than your leader) that has a Move token. Remove that token: that fighter is not considered to have moved for the purposes of their subsequent actions. You can only play this if your leader is on the battlefield
name: Tyrant's Command

description: When this fighter takes an enemy leader out of action, gain an additional glory point
name: Apex Predator

description: This fighter is considered to be two supporting fighters when it supports another fighter
name: Commanding Presence

description: Action: Push a friendly fighter (other than your leader) up to two hexes
name: Commanding Shout

description: +1 Defence, -2 Wounds (to a minimum of 1)
name: Cursed Shield

description: If this fighter is on the battlefield in the third end phase, gain 1 glory point
name: Hero's Mantle

description: Reaction: During an adjacent enemy fighter’s Attack action, before any dice are rolled, change the target of that Attack action to this fighter and discard this card
name: Irresistible Challenge

description: If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities
name: Katophrane's Ring

description: [1 Hex | 2 Swords | 3 Damage] If the target is a leader, you can re-roll one attack dice when making this Attack action
name: Kingsbane

description: Reaction: After an enemy fighter makes a Move action and ends their move adjacent to another friendly fighter that is your leader, push this fighter up to two hexes. They must end the push adjacent to the enemy fighter
name: Loyal Defender

description: If this fighter is on the battlefield, at the beginning of the round you can draw one objective card. If you do so, discard one objective card
name: Master of Tactics

description: Action: Push an adjacent enemy fighter up to one hex
name: Mighty Shove

description: If your leader is out of action, this fighter has +1 Wounds and the Attack actions on their fighter card have +1 Dice
name: Rising to the Challenge

description: Reaction: After this fighter makes a Move action (not as part of a Charge action) discard this card. They do not gain a Move token and are not considered to have moved for the purposes of their subsequent actions
name: Seize the Day

description: Reaction: After an action or ploy that takes your leader out of action, if this fighter is on the battlefield, gain 1 glory point
name: Treacherous Second

description: If this fighter is supporting your leader, they are considered to be two supporting fighters
name: Trusted Second

description: Reaction: After an adjacent friendly fighter’s Attack action that fails, that fighter takes 2 damage. If they survive, they can make another Attack action
name: Tyrant's Lash
